body_html: Ah, correct: tf.nn.max_pool does not support dynamic size. ksize is an attr, therefore must be a constant. This would be reasonable to fix, but would require a MaxPoolV2 op kernel similar to TopKV2. I'll leave it open as contributions welcome.
body_text: Ah, correct: tf.nn.max_pool does not support dynamic size.  ksize is an attr, therefore must be a constant.  This would be reasonable to fix, but would require a MaxPoolV2 op kernel similar to TopKV2.  I'll leave it open as contributions welcome.
body: Ah, correct: `tf.nn.max_pool` does not support dynamic size.  `ksize` is an attr, therefore must be a constant.  This would be reasonable to fix, but would require a `MaxPoolV2` op kernel similar to `TopKV2`.  I'll leave it open as contributions welcome.
